titles: The badger in the fox-trap, or, A Satyr upon satyrs.
author: Dean, J. (John), fl. 1679-1685.
notes: A political satire in verse on Shaftesbury.
Attributed to J. Dean. Cf. BM.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, --  Earl of, 1621-1683 --  Poetry.
